archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Make Specified Party Payment Application
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Apply a party payment to referenced to bill(s), charge(s), purchase(s), payment plan(s) accompanying the payment.

properties.value: Make Specified Party Payment Application applies a party payment to referenced to bill(s), charge(s), purchase(s), payment plan(s) accompanying the payment. If the payment is made against a payment plan the payment is applied against the charge(s)/bill(s)/invoice(s), purchase(s) associated with the payment plan.
